paragraphs: I am an AI Scientist with expertise in explainable AI, AI for social good, and natural language processing, holding a PhD in Digital Financial Technology from NUS. Through my extensive network of industry leaders, academic researchers, and public sector stakeholders, I work to translate cutting-edge AI research into real-world solutions.

experience.description: Lead agentic AI strategy across development, due diligence, and safety initiatives. Drive ecosystem growth through applied research, grants, and community collaboration programs. Focus on advancing Singapore's AI capabilities in the public sector.

experience.company: Asian Institute of Digital Finance, NUS
experience.description: Completed PhD in Digital Financial Technology with thesis titled 'Human-Centered AI for Financial Decision Making'. Developed state-of-the-art ML and generative AI models for risk classification, fraud detection, and explainable financial information extraction. Published at top-tier conferences.

Led end-to-end digital banking solutions under SEED Graduate Associate Programme. Integrated RESTful APIs, MQs, and Tivoli interfaces using agile methodology. Contributed to Celent Model Bank 2021 award. Developed iOS apps and won OWASP Secure Coding Competition. Worked throughout Covid-19 as essential bank staff.

Specialized in physical design automation and low-power VLSI, optimizing placement, routability, and power analysis with EDA tools and scripting. Co-developed a graph-theory-based power analysis tool, published at SNUG 2018.
